iana.encoding_considerations:
Encoding of this media type follows the same principles as specified
for the XML media types in [RFC-2376].
iana.security_considerations:
As an XML format, binary WML has the same security considerations as
specified in [RFC-2376].
iana.interoperability_considerations:
The WAP Forum Ltd. Interoperability Working Group (WIG) assess
interoperability for all WAP Forum Ltd. specifications. See [WAP].
iana.additional_information:
The data is WML in Binary XML format. The binary XML specification is
available at http://www.wapforum.org/docs/technical1.1/.

Magic number(s): none
File extension(s): .wmlc .wbxml
Macintosh File Type Code(s): n/a
iana.template_text:
(last updated 2015-05-19)

From: "Peter Stark" <stark&uplanet.com>
To: <iana&iana.org>
Subject: Registration of MIME media types in application/vnd.wap.wmlc
Date: Tue, 2 Mar 1999 16:53:09 -0800

MIME media type name: application

MIME subtype name: vnd.wap.wmlc

Required parameters: none

Optional parameters: charset and level

The level parameter indicates the WML version. The value has the
format: <major>.<minor>; where major and minor are integers. For
example, level="1.1" indicates version 1.1.

The charset parameter is the same as specified in [rfc-2046].

Encoding considerations:

Encoding of this media type follows the same principles as specified
for the XML media types in [RFC-2376].

Security considerations:

As an XML format, binary WML has the same security considerations as
specified in [RFC-2376].

Interoperability considerations:

The WAP Forum Ltd. Interoperability Working Group (WIG) assess
interoperability for all WAP Forum Ltd. specifications. See [WAP].

Published specification:

The WML specification is available at
http://technical.openmobilealliance.org/Technical/technical-information/material-from-affiliates/wap-forum

Applications which use this media type:

Any that conforms to the WML specification.

Additional information:

The data is WML in Binary XML format. The binary XML specification is
available at http://www.wapforum.org/docs/technical1.1/.

Magic number(s): none
File extension(s): .wmlc .wbxml
Macintosh File Type Code(s): n/a

Person & email address to contact for further information:

Peter Stark
Unwired Planet
stark&uplanet.com

Intended usage: COMMON

Author/Change controller: The WAP Forum Ltd.
